snippet: A man with a rifle fired up to two dozen rounds at the federal court building in Wheeling on Wednesday before security officers killed him, the United States Marshals Service said.
abstract: West Virginia police say retired police officer Thomas J Piccard fired up to two dozen shots at the federal courthouse in Wheeling before officers returned fire and killed him; no motive is apparent.
lead_paragraph: A man with a rifle fired up to two dozen rounds at the federal court building in Wheeling on Wednesday before security officers killed him, the United States Marshals Service said.

headline.main: West Virginia: Man Killed After Firing Into Courthouse
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Man Killed After Firing Into Courthouse
